Name: Image.Flip
Desc: Flips the image horizontally, vertically, or both.
LongDesc: The Flip method mirrors the image along the specified axis (horizontal, vertical, or both). It supports smoothing and quality options for high-quality transformations.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Flip('vertical'); });
